abstract.para: This manual documents the interfaces of the libxslt library and has some short notes to help get you up to speed with using the library.

chapter.title: Libxslt Programming Notes
chapter.para: Libxslt is an XSLT toolkit library, which allows you to transform XML documents. It uses the XML parser, tree and XPath functionalities of libxml2
